remarks: The monotone image of a directed set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Apr-2015.)
statement:
ipodrsima.f $e |- ( ph -> F Fn ~P A ) $.
ipodrsima.m $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( u C_ v /\ v C_ A ) ) -> ( F ` u ) C_ ( F ` v ) ) $.
ipodrsima.d $e |- ( ph -> ( toInc ` B ) e. Dirset ) $.
ipodrsima.s $e |- ( ph -> B C_ ~P A ) $.
ipodrsima.a $e |- ( ph -> ( F " B ) e. V ) $.
ipodrsima $p |- ( ph -> ( toInc ` ( F " B ) ) e. Dirset ) $.
$d A u v $.
$d F u v $.
$d ph u v $.
